sentences.sentence: “When you distill your own liquor, sometimes you end up with a bad batch,” whispered Tom.
sentences.translation: “你自己蒸馏造酒，有时会最终弄得一塌糊涂。” 汤姆小声说。

sentences.sentence: They do not distill the music-gathering process.
sentences.translation: 他们不去浓缩提炼收集音乐的过程。

sentences.sentence: Having limited space to make your point really forces you to distill and clarify your message.
sentences.translation: 标题区给你表达观点的空间有限，迫使你必须提炼和阐明你的讯息。
